name: Compare basic-auth with constant time
body:
Changelog:
* Compare basic-auth with constant time #33

This is a security improvement, it's recommended to upgrade if you are using basic-auth in your provider.

name: Ensure that the proxy request response body is closed
body:
Changelog:
* Ensure that the proxy request response body is closed #32 @LucasRoesler 

This only affects users who are using the provider to proxy their requests and not Swarm/K8s.

name: Allow basic auth decoration
body:
Protected/system endpoints can now be decorated with basic auth

```
// FaaSConfig set config for HTTP handlers
type FaaSConfig struct {
	TCPPort         *int
	ReadTimeout     time.Duration
	WriteTimeout    time.Duration
	EnableHealth    bool
	EnableBasicAuth bool
	SecretMountPath string
}
```

Set `EnableBasicAuth` to true and populate the value for `SecretMountPath`.

name: Include basic-auth packages
body: Moves out middle-ware and loading code from gateway in openfaas/faas.

name: Add /system/info endpoint
body: Adds stub for `/system/info` endpoint and associated stub.

body: Add health endpoint and custom route support by exposing router.

name: Use PUT verb for updates to existing services.
